versions.description:
1. Added new HD movie releases notification
2. Added "New HD Releases" movies category
3. Added "Amazon" TV shows category
4. Added "Hulu" TV shows category
5. Added "Hide episode synopsis" option\6. Added "Resolve HD links only" option

13. Fixed existing URLs resolvers
14. Fixed categories being messed up
15. Fixed bugs related to Trakt.tv
16. Fixed bugs related to Chromecast subtitles
17. Fixed bugs related to video download
18. Fixed various bugs and crashes
19. Improved UI
20. Improved performance
